# Lesson 1

## key application of AI

- Finance
- robotics
- game
- medicine
- the web

## intelligent agent

Perception-action circle

environment -> sensor(感知器) -> agent -> decision making -> actuator（执行器） -> environment

pic：![classroom.udacity.com_courses_cs271_lessons_48688925_concepts_487421730923 (2).png](quiver-image-url/D63BAC2FD2A4495D4CB88459BF1388F4.png =545x289)

## four key attribute of AI

- fully observable(完全可观测) vs partially observable（need memory；部分可观测）
- deterministic（确定性） vs stochastic（随机形）
- discrete（离散） vs continuous（连续）
- benign（良性） vs adversarial（对抗性）

## AI as uncertainty management

AI make desicions for people when they don't know what to do (uncertainty)

reasons for uncertainty

- sensor limits
- adversaries
- stochastic environments
- laziness
- ignorance


## rationality

以 machine translation 为例

- translation model：比较已有的原文与译文文本，建立原文与译文的 correspondence
- translation：寻找模型中最匹配的译文，翻译新文本
